```{r}
delayed_discharge_df <- read_csv(here("raw_data/delayed-discharge-beddays-health-board.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()

```

```{r}
#use this
delayed_discharge_df <- delayed_discharge_df %>% 
  mutate(datetime = ym(month_of_delay), .after = month_of_delay) %>% 
  filter(datetime >= "2018-04-01")
```


```{r}
delayed_discharge_df %>% 
  filter(!age_group == "18plus") %>% 
  filter(!reason_for_delay == "All Delay Reasons") %>% 
ggplot() + 
  aes(x = datetime) +
  geom_line(aes(y = average_daily_number_of_delayed_beds, color = "#A61103")) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = number_of_delayed_bed_days, colour = "#603BF2"))+
  scale_y_sqrt() +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("#A61103", "#603BF2"), labels = c("avg_daily","number_delayed")) +
labs(colour = "Delayed Beds")

```
